item.title: The U.S. CFTC will issue guidance clarifying the rules for foreign trading platform registration.
item.description: On August 29th, Crypto journalist Eleanor Terrett disclosed that the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) is scheduled to issue guidance to clarify its Foreign Board of Trade (FBOT) registration rules. This provides a legal avenue for non-U.S. exchanges to enable U.S. users to trade on their platforms. Acting Chairman Caroline D. Pham stated that this is a means to bring crypto activities "back to the U.S." as such activities had previously flowed out due to enforcement actions during the Biden administration. At the same time, it reaffirms the regulatory framework that has been in place since the 1990s. For U.S. traders, this implies that they can legally access more global liquidity. For the crypto industry, this is another step towards regulatory clarity and is also part of the Trump administration's "crypto sprint" strategy.

item.title: BNB surges over 1.5% in a short period, as Eleanor Terrett previously mentioned that the US CFTC will issue guidance to clarify rules for foreign trading platform registration.
item.description: On August 29th, BNB experienced a brief surge of more than 1.5% and is currently trading at $875.Earlier, the crypto journalist Eleanor Terrett posted that the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) is going to issue guidance to clarify its Foreign Board of Trade (FBOT) registration rules, thus providing a legal way for non-U.S. exchanges to enable U.S. users to trade on their platforms.

item.title: WLFI Pre-market Price Surges Over 19% in 24 Hours, Currently Trading at $0.317
item.description: On August 29th, based on HTX market data, the pre-market price of WLFI (World Liberty Financial) witnessed a surge of more than 19% within the past 24 hours. It is currently trading at $0.317.

item.title: CyberKongz: 2% of the total supply of KONG is airdropped to addresses that have purchased Ethereum-based NFTs on OpenSea since 2023, with a total amount of $10,000 or more.
item.description: On August 29th, according to official channels, the Ethereum NFT and gaming project CyberKongz announced that 2% of the total supply of KONG will be airdropped to OpenSea users who have been active since 2023 (during the bear market). Addresses that have purchased a total of 10,000 US dollars worth of Ethereum NFTs on OpenSea since January 1, 2023, are eligible to participate in the airdrop. More details will be disclosed shortly.Previously reported, on August 20th, CyberKongz announced the launch of a new token, KONG, serving as the liquidity layer of its ecosystem and completely replacing the original token BANANA. The token will only be issued on the Ethereum mainnet, with a total supply of 1 billion tokens. BANANA can be converted to KONG at a ratio of 1:25 (opening at TGE). The airdrop plan is to airdrop 2% of the total token supply to the Ethereum NFT community, with specific details to be announced.

item.title: Solana-Powered Meme Coin COPE Surpasses $13 Million Market Cap, with a 24-Hour Trading Volume of $26 Million
item.description: On August 29th, based on GMGN data, the Solana-based Meme coin COPE has exceeded a market capitalization of $13 million and reached a new all-time high, with a 24-hour trading volume of $26 million.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins usually lack practical use cases and have significant price volatility, and investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: Solana Mobile is excited to announce that Seeker Season will kick off on September 8th.
item.description: On August 29th, Solana Mobile made an announcement that it will initiate the Seeker Season on September 8th. The Seeker Season is going to serve as the catalyst for the next-generation on-chain mobile applications. Commencing from September 8th, curated dApps, rewards, and exclusive on-chain mobile experiences specifically designed for Seeker users will be rolled out on a weekly basis.

item.title: The judge overseeing the Federal Reserve Board Governor Cook case is scheduled to hold a hearing on Friday.
item.description: On August 29th, as reported by CNBC, the judge in charge of the case involving Federal Reserve Board Governor Lael Brainard is planned to conduct a hearing on Friday. (Markets Insider)

item.title: Four Whales Bought $357.2 Million Worth of ETH in the Last 2 Days
item.description: On August 29th, according to Arkham's monitoring, the Four Whales purchased $3.572 billion worth of ETH within the past 2 days. And all of them received ETH from FalconX at a similar time.

item.title: CZ: Holds a large amount of BNB, with a significant portion of wealth tied to it
item.description: August 29th. During the BNB Day Fireside Chat held in Tokyo, CZ declared that the BNB Chain is mainly driven by the community. He himself hasn't put in a lot of effort; mainly, he tweets and encourages people to BUILD. He also disclosed that he holds a substantial amount of BNB, and a large portion of his wealth is tied to it.If he were 20 years old, CZ said he would choose to develop an AI trading agent and a privacy-focused perpetual decentralized exchange (DEX). He believes that the trading volume of DEX will surpass that of centralized exchanges (CEX) in the future; DeFi is the future. He also thinks that real-world assets (RWAs) are still in their early stages but have great potential. He hopes to see a dedicated BNB Chain team in Japan. He mentioned that Japan is highly suitable for technological development and has a good business culture. He hopes to see more AI + robot projects emerge on the BNB Chain.CZ believes that a Digital Asset Treasury (DAT) makes cryptocurrency inv

item.title: WLFI pre-market price breaks above $0.28, up 6.41% in the last 24 hours
item.description: On August 28th, according to HTX market data, the pre-market trading price of WLFI (World Liberty Financial) has surpassed $0.28 and is currently trading at $0.282, with a 6.41% increase in the past 24 hours.According to Coinglass data, the total open interest of WLFI futures contracts on the network is currently $423 million, and the trading volume in the past 24 hours is $755 million. The current network-wide aggregated long/short ratio is 0.947.BlockBeats previously reported that the project of the Trump family, World Liberty Finance (WLFI), is scheduled to be launched on Ethereum on September 1st with open claiming and trading. Early supporters (in the $0.015 and $0.05 rounds) will unlock 20%, and the remaining 80% will be determined by community voting. Tokens held by the founding team, advisors, and partners will not be unlocked. Trading will start at 8:00 PM on September 1st (Beijing time), and the 20% token claiming will begin.
